lore: The children of Regalis mainly inhabit the Arachnid Nest, but they have spread through Rodia and have an ecological niche in most of the country's ecosystems.\n\nSpitting Arachnalisks sometimes compete for territory with each other, through a very particular confrontation. Each contender builds a web in the shape of a target approximately 10 meters away from its rival, and they take turns to spit acid on each other's webs until one of them falls.
menagerieDialog: (These creatures are a real plague... but they can be useful in battle.)
(It's surrounded by a bunch of massive, human-sized cocoons. But why are they moving?)
(It's making a high-pitched screeching noise. You're not quite sure what that means, but it seems to be comfortable enough.)
(It hands you a little doll made out of web silk. Ugh.)
(It begins to raise up into the air as if it were floating, but upon closer inspection, its silken thread is just barely visible.)
name: Spitting Arachnalisk
